ygData.subject: Re: Chains secretly nerfed?
ygData.msgSnippet: Not just you - I just made 23 - been using chain for about 5 days, and last night WAS very different. I use dennons with a horn a lot too - and am being
ygData.messageBody:
Not just you - I just made 23 - been using chain for about 5 days, and last
night WAS very different.

I use dennons with a horn a lot too - and am being resisted at least 25 -
40% more by mobs that NEVER resisted it before.

Ya know - I sure am heartily sick of tweaking without notice.

Oh - anyone else notice buffs not lasting as long either?




At 09:47 AM 11/4/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
>I didn't really do any testing last night, but after one or two uses last
>night, I came to the conclusion that our snare song has been secretly
>nerfed. Before, using this song on a monster at half life or less would
>effectively freeze it in its tracks. Last night, casting it on mostly dead
>mobs still allowed the mobs to move as a regular snare would.
>Anyone else noticed this, or is it just me?
>
>
>Elwyn Heartstring
>Level 50 Bard
>Erollisi Marr
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
